name: Poppy
description: Born on December 24, 2024, Poppy the Hippo arrived as the tiniest bundle of joy, perfectly timed to bring love, warmth, and a touch of magic to the holiday season. This adorable pygmy hippo calf is the beloved daughter of Iris and Corwin, and she has already captured the hearts of everyone who meets her. With her big, curious eyes that sparkle with wonder and her wiggly little tail that seems to wag with excitement, Poppy is a true symbol of hope and happiness. As one of the most enchanting arrivals in recent years, Poppy has quickly become a favorite among visitors and caregivers alike. Her playful nature and gentle personality make her a joy to watch as she explores her surroundings with innocent curiosity. Whether splashing in the water for her very first swim or snuggling close to her mother, Poppy is a reminder of the beauty and fragility of life. More than just a newborn, Poppy represents the importance of conservation efforts for pygmy hippos, an endangered species. Her story inspires people to learn about these extraordinary creatures and support initiatives to protect their natural habitats, ensuring that future generations can experience the same joy she brings to the world.
